content.text: FAQs on UAE Attestation in Delhi

content.question: Is embassy attestation mandatory for UAE visa?
content.answer: Yes. The UAE government mandates attested documents from applicants outside the country.

content.question: Can I get UAE attestation from cities other than Delhi?
content.answer: All UAE embassy attestation happens in Delhi, but you can submit documents from any part of India through Pro Attestation Services.

content.question: How can I speed up the attestation process?

content.question: Does MOFA attestation happen in India?
content.answer: No. MOFA attestation is the final step done in the UAE after embassy attestation.
